name: ReliefClub, Inc.
description: Developer of a modern financial technology platform intended to provide premium financial services for both personal and business banking in a single application. The company's application provides a digital account with instant zero-interest loans and fees, tracks bills, and projects income, it is also developing non-financial SaaS (software-as-a-service) products for the small business market enabling users to enjoy digital banking services conveniently.
one_liner: Developer of a modern financial technology platform intended to provide premium financial services for both personal and business banking in a single application. The company's application provides a digital account with instant zero-interest loans and fees, tracks bills, and projects income, it is also developing non-financial SaaS (software-as-a-service) products for the small business market enabling users to enjoy digital banking services conveniently.
